detail_desc: Short, gently fitted dress in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the hems, and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Briefs in soft, stretch silk and lace with a mid waist and high cut at the back.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a gathered seam at the shoulders and frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a large drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist and side pockets with a decorative pompom trim.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist and side pockets with a decorative pompom trim.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Sleeveless top in a soft, hole-knit cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless top in a soft, hole-knit cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top and slits in the sides.
Waterproof trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Waterproof trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Lined.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Lined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined.
Bucket hat in fluffy pile with a shiny satin lining. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Romper suit in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with a round neckline, buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves. Patch front pockets, a gathered seam at the top and covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Water bottle in plastic with a detachable fabric wrist strap and non-drip lid with a straw. Capacity 450 ml.
Water bottle in plastic with a detachable fabric wrist strap and non-drip lid with a straw. Capacity 450 ml.

Sleeveless romper suit in an airy viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top and elastication at the back. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and covered elastication at the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in an airy viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top and elastication at the back. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and covered elastication at the hems.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a flounced trim at the sides of the bib and flounce-trimmed straps with buttons at the front. Elastication at the waist and hems, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a flounced trim at the sides of the bib and flounce-trimmed straps with buttons at the front. Elastication at the waist and hems, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front, short raglan sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front, short raglan sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Ballet pumps in soft suede with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative, spotted bow. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated velvet with a sheen. Regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Hair elastics with bows and shiny plastic beads at the ends. No metal clips.
Hair elastics with bows and shiny plastic beads at the ends. No metal clips.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Large scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a belt in a sturdy weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button and fake pockets. Belt with a metal buckle and imitation leather details.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a belt in a sturdy weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button and fake pockets. Belt with a metal buckle and imitation leather details.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Hat in paper straw with a contrasting colour trim around the brim. Width of brim 16 cm.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a fine-knit silk and organic cotton blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Captain’s cap in a textured weave. Satin lining.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave. High, elasticated waist with a small frill trim, fly with visible buttons and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight, ankle-length legs.

Set with a top and tulle skirt. Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print on the front and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with a partially visible glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Cotton twill shorts in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Cotton twill shorts in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature that can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. V-neck, decorative gathers at the front to create a gently draping effect and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Briefs in cotton designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Yoyo in plastic with a lenticular print. Diameter 5.5 cm.

Oversized jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Set with a long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit, an all-in-one suit and a hat in a soft cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Velour all-in-one suit with concealed, off-centre, press-stud fastenings down the front and along one leg, and full feet with elasticated heels. Velour hat with a jersey hem. The cotton content of the garments is organic.
Double-layered scarf in pile with an opening at one end for a simple way to fasten it around the neck.
Double-layered scarf in pile with an opening at one end for a simple way to fasten it around the neck.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a Christmas motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slipover in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Knee-length nursing dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a draped effect. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.

Knee-length nursing dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a draped effect. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.

Long dress in softly draping satin with a deep V-neck and flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats around the shoulders. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined at the top.

Long dress in softly draping satin with a deep V-neck and flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats around the shoulders. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined at the top.

Blouse in a soft Tencel® lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the top with buttons, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. High slits with ties at the sides for easier nursing access. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
